Our upcoming annual seminar will take place in the late spring/ealy summer of 2023 and cover the topic of welding for hydrogen applications, such as hydrogen transport. This one-day seminar will feature international speakers with manufacturing experience for hydrogen applications and cover the fundamental knowledge you will need to work in this field.
